statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 10 \\ -4 \\ -12 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -24 \\ 8 \\ 24 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
